titleStmt.title: The unreasonableness and impiety of popery: in a second letter written upon the discovery of the late plot..
titleStmt.author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Chiswell, at the sign of the Rose and Crown in St. Paul's Church-yard,,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Gilbert Burnet, Bishop of Salisbury. Cf. McAlpin Coll., Halkett & Laing.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
